data.name: Echoes of Mayhem
data.detailed_description:
Echoes of Mayhem is a roguelite multiplayer action RPG dungeon crawler. You'll fight through a procedural dungeon of monsters and bosses in an attempt to reforge the world. You'll score loot along the way and gather resources to upgrade your town and unlock new tiers of items and abilities.



Explore a broken world, ripped apart by a chaotic force. Make your way through dungeons in a quest to repair the shattered elemental islands. Then explore the restored pieces of these islands to finally confront the forces of Mayhem.




Choose how you want to play with unique items and abilities. As you progress through the levels you will be given choices of powers called "Echoes" that will provide a unique experience with each playthrough. You can opt to smash your enemies with a giant mace, torch groups of skeletons with fireballs, or heal your friends with restorative magics!




Make your way through procedural dungeons fighting packs of enemies and mini-bosses. At the end of each dungeon will be a final level boss. Bring back elemental shards to restore the shattered islands. Defeat the corrupted elemental bosses to unlock and defeat the final boss.




Venture out into the world and bring back resources from gathering spots and from defeating enemies in dungeons. Upgrade your town to unlock new tiers of dungeon items. Customize your character with unique guild traits and abilities like enhanced damage, movement speed, or the ability to rescue a fallen player.


    Features
  • Character progression persistence - Your characters will level up and gain experience from runs and retain select constant items to reuse after dungeon runs or deaths.
  • Town Upgrades – Bring those resources back and upgrade the town for stat boosts to all players in your game, as well as unlock new tiers of dungeon items and guild traits and abilities.
  • Five unique elemental dungeons to unlock and explore, each with unique resources, monsters, and crafting. In addition to the final Chaos dungeon, you will unlock the four elemental magic dungeons: Fire, Water, Earth, Air.
  • Classless system: Abilities are based off your choices from a variety of items you can equip and use; you pick how you want to play.
  • Full Custom Behaviour Tree based AI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Amd Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 or AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
